patthana21.8:4.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.8:5.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.8:6.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.8:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
